plume.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a cloud of smoke, dust etc which rises up into the air
plume.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A black plume of smoke rose above the city.
plume.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a large feather or bunch of feathers, especially one that is used as a decoration on a hat
plume.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to rise or come out in a cloud
